GameEventAction.Description:
Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Governance[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our first such facility has already been constructed on our homeworld.

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Space Construction[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Expanded Space Stations[/RESEARCH][/ULI]

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Star Fighters[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Zero-G Combat[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Ship Boarding[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
An infantry force is also available on our homeworld.

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Expanded Civilian Ships[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Expanded Space Stations[/RESEARCH][/ULI]

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Escorts[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]System Patrol Starships[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Shock Forces[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
An armor force is also available on our homeworld.

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Coordinated Control[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Crew Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Palace[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our palace and an infantry force is also available on our homeworld.

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Exploration Scanners[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Exploration[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
A [CHARACTER]scientist[/CHARACTER] is also available on our homeworld.

Due to our chosen government, we have gained insight into:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Logistics[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Long Range Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
An infantry force is also available on our homeworld.
